Title: Blue on Blue
Plot: More than 20 warships close in on the Colorado. As Kendal is forced into a battle on the ground, Prosser questions Marcus' judgement.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jay Hernandez, Jay Karnes, Michael Ng, Omid Abtahi, John Prosky, Assaf Cohen, Jenny Cooper, Ilia Volok, Chad Michael Collins
